diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +117,121 @@
        with processor.node.account.monitor_log(processor.STDERR_FILE) as monitor:
            processor.start()
            monitor.wait_until('Exception in thread "main" org.apache.kafka.streams.errors.BrokerNotFoundException: Could not find any available broker.',
                               timeout_sec=60,

@@ -1,1 +100,104 @@
        with processor.node.account.monitor_log(processor.STDERR_FILE) as monitor:
            processor.start()
            monitor.wait_until('FATAL: An unexpected exception org.apache.kafka.common.errors.UnsupportedVersionException: The broker does not support CREATE_TOPICS',
                        timeout_sec=60,

comments.body: Yes. This is a race condition -- we always need to get the monitor first -- also unclear to me, why we start the processor twice in the old code...

comments.body: Seems we forgot to update this for a couple of releases... If we all agree, I can open corresponding PRs for older branches to close this test gap there, too.
